Package io.helidon.service.configuration.localhost

Class LocalhostSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.helidon.service.configuration.api.System
      • io.helidon.service.configuration.localhost.LocalhostSystem

  • public final class LocalhostSystem
extends System
    A non-authoritative System implementation describing the current local host.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson
    See Also:
    System

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalhostSystem()
      Creates a new LocalhostSystem named localhost that is enabled and not authoritative.
